meanings.sent1: She sat quiescently on the park bench, enjoying the peaceful surroundings.
meanings.sent2: The cat slept quiescently in the warm sunbeam.
meanings.sent3: The teacher waited quiescently for the students to settle down before starting the lesson.

meanings.definition: In a state of inactivity or dormancy.
meanings.sent1: The volcano remained quiescently for many years before erupting again.
meanings.sent2: The seeds lay quiescently in the soil, waiting for the right conditions to sprout.
meanings.sent3: The bear appeared quiescently in its den, not bothering anyone.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house stood quiescently at the end of the street, its windows boarded up.
meanings.sent5: The computer screen glowed quiescently in the dark room, signaling that it was on standby mode.
